dct:title.value: Reduction of pollution load to marine waters from a vegetable oil refinery at Bejaia, Algeria

bibo:abstract.value: Waste water from a vegetable oil refinery located at Bejaia (Algeria) has been found to introduce a very high pollution load to the receiving marine waters. Experiments of de-oiling followed by coagulation and flocculation showed the method quite effective in removing most of the fat content, about half of the chemical oxygen demand and one-fifth of the suspended matter.
